body_html: No, with CUDA 8. Except for the confusion about the developer command prompt window (I was using the 32 bit shortcut, instead of the x64 version), peterjc's instructions worked out of the box. Perhaps you should try with CUDA 8 first?

body: No, with CUDA 8. Except for the confusion about the developer command prompt window (I was using the 32 bit shortcut, instead of the x64 version), peterjc's instructions worked out of the box. Perhaps you should try with CUDA 8 first?
